thread.title: BRIEF-Tradelink Electronic Commerce Says Won ‍Tender For Provision Of Electronic Trading Service

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tradelink Electronic Commerce Says Won ‍Tender For Provision Of Electronic Trading Service

organizations.name: brief-tradelink electronic commerce says won ‍tender for provision of electronic trading service

text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - Tradelink Electronic Commerce Ltd :
* GOVERNMENT OF HONG KONG SPECIAL ADMINISTRATIVE REGION ACCEPTED ITS TENDER
* ‍TENDER FOR PROVISION OF GOVERNMENT ELECTRONIC TRADING SERVICES FOR 6 YEARS COMMENCING ON JAN 1 2019 TO DEC 31 2024​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
